(USANYS)" 
Subject: Re: Laptop for Ghislaine Maxwell (Reg. No. 
02879-509) 
Date: Tue, 17 Nov 2020 13:59:22 +0000 
Good 
morning, 
We will have a new hard drive with a new discovery production for Maxwell ready tomorrow. Would it be alright 
if I brought both the laptop and hard drive to the MDC tomorrow instead of just the laptop today, please? 
Thank ou 
On Nov 16, 2020, at 2:01 PM, wrote: 
Will do, thank you very much. 
Assistant  United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1 St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York. NY 10007 
From: 
Sent: Monday, November 16, 2020 1:59 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
(USANYS) 
Subject: Re: Laptop for Ghislaine Maxwell (Reg. No. 02879-509) 
Drop it off anytime between 600 am and 1200 pm. 
>>> 
From: 
To: 
CC: 
esoy> 
np_gu>,
bePa>a>, 
(USANYS)" 
Date: 1 16 2020 1:58 PM 
Subject: Laptop for Ghislaine Maxwell (Reg. No. 02879-509) 
Good afternoon, 
I am planning to bring a laptop and charger for inmate Ghislaine Maxwell (Reg. No. 02879-509) to use when 
reviewing discovery produced from my office. Attached please find the accompanying cover letter, which I will 
hand deliver with the laptop. I am available to make this delivery tomorrow. Would you please let me know what 
time I should arrive with the laptop? 
EFTA00009924

My understanding from s that I should bring the laptop to the East Building, located on 29th
Street near Std Avenue and that I should go to the front lobby and ask for who will then come and 
retrieve the laptop. Please let me know if that should take any different steps. 
As always, I can be reached on my cellphone a with any questions or concerns. 
Thank you, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1 St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00009925
